Text: Can any admin bother telling us why is the download torrent gone? All it's left is the magnet link, which was an alternative till now. You make the rules, but at least you can grant us some courtesy and tell us why, or at least from now on...

Sorry BOZX, I got carried away and forgot to thank you. I was just thinking a few days ago when watching Immortals, about what a nice lad used to be Mickey Rourke, and how he changed, and the first movie (from his youth) that came to my mind was 9 1/2 weeks... 25 years passed, and at least he's still acting, so it could be worse than having a bad guy face...
Thanks again!
